title: Provides tax credit of $300 for purchase of 3 or more energy star appliances
summary: Provides $300 tax credit for purchase of three or more energy star appliances; applies to tax years 2012 through 2018.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2241

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 14, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. RABBITT, McKEVITT, MOLINARO -- Multi-Sponsored by
         --  M. of A.  BROOK-KRASNY, CALHOUN, CROUCH, DUPREY, GIGLIO, P. LOPEZ,
         OAKS, SAYWARD, WEISENBERG -- read once and referred to  the  Committee
         on Ways and Means

       AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to credits against tax

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 606 of the tax law  is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  subsection (ss) to read as follows:
    3    (SS) ENERGY STAR APPLIANCE CREDIT. A TAXPAYER SHALL BE ALLOWED A CRED-
    4  IT  IN  THE  SUM  OF THREE HUNDRED DOLLARS BEGINNING ON OR AFTER JANUARY
    5  FIRST, TWO THOUSAND TWELVE AND ENDING BEFORE DECEMBER THIRTY-FIRST,  TWO
    6  THOUSAND  EIGHTEEN  IF  HE  OR  SHE  PURCHASES THREE OR MORE ENERGY STAR
    7  APPLIANCES. FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS  SECTION  THE  TERM  "ENERGY  STAR"
    8  SHALL MEAN A DESIGNATION FROM THE UNITED STATES ENVIRONMENTAL PROTECTION
    9  AGENCY OR DEPARTMENT OF ENERGY INDICATING THAT A PRODUCT MEETS THE ENER-
   10  GY  EFFICIENCY STANDARDS SET FORTH BY THE AGENCY FOR COMPLIANCE WITH THE
   11  ENERGY STAR PROGRAM. THE TERM "APPLIANCE" SHALL MEAN BUT NOT BE  LIMITED
   12  TO  REFRIGERATOR,  ROOM AIR CONDITIONER, DISHWASHER OR CLOTHES WASHER OR
   13  DRYER.
   14    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately and shall apply to all tax
   15  years beginning on or after January 1, 2012 and ending  before  December
   16  31, 2018.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03518-01-1
